questions.question: What is the predominant color of the visible labeling on the container?
What is the overall shape of the product container?
What material appears to constitute the main body of the product container?
Based on the visible text, what is the net weight of the product contained inside?
What is the apparent texture of the container's surface?
What is the general color of the product powder within the container (as visible through the plastic)?
Considering the label, what type of product is this container likely to hold?
What is the most prominent symbol or icon displayed on the label?
Does the container show any noticeable dents or scratches?
Are there any discernible patterns or designs on the container's surface aside from text?
What language(s) are used prominently on the product label?
What is the overall condition of the container?
Is the container transparent, translucent, or opaque?
Is the cap or lid of the container visible in the image?
Does the container have a handle or other aids for gripping?
